member.name: M:ChaseLabs.Math.AESMath.DecryptStringAES(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Decrypt the given string. Assumes the string was encrypted using EncryptStringAES(), using an identical sharedSecret.
member.param: A password used to generate a key for decryption. Default is Machine Name

member.name: M:ChaseLabs.Math.AESMath.EncryptStringAES(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Encrypt the given string using AES. The string can be decrypted using DecryptStringAES(). The sharedSecret parameters must match.
member.param: A password used to generate a key for encryption. Default is Machine Name

member.name: T:CLMath.Convert
member.summary: Class for converting one type to another
